intro: Kohleria × hillii, commonly known as the hybrid kohleria, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, tubular flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, often found on trees in humid, shaded environments. Its foliage consists of glossy, ovate leaves that are often variegated with white or silver markings. Kohleria × hillii is popular in horticulture for its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
